col.name: alt_sample_name
description: if another identifier is used, for example in supplemental tables

col.name: unique_patient_ID
description: Use this column if there are technical replicates.  If this column contains non-unique entries, expression values of those arrays will eventually be averaged.

col.name: sample_type
description: healthy should be only from individuals without cancer, metastatic for non-primary tumors

col.name: T
description: T (1-4): size in TNM staging: see http://www.cancer.gov/cancertopics/pdq/treatment/breast/healthprofessional/page3.

col.name: N
description: N (0/1): spread to regional lymph nodes no/yes

col.name: grade
description: Taken directly from Haibe-Kains paper, PMID 22262870

col.name: dmfs_days
description: Potentially censored number of days from diagnosis to distant metastasis or death (dmfs).

col.name: days_to_tumor_recurrence
description: This is a potentially censored time from diagnosis to recurrence (rfs).

col.name: days_to_death
description: This is a potentially censored time from diagnosis to death.

col.name: batch
description: batch variable - hybridization date when Affymetrix CEL files are available.

col.name: uncurated_author_metadata
description: original uncurated data, with each field separated by ///.
